title: Flamed for using Malphite Ultimate as a "fancy flash"
body:
I just got counter-picked by a Shyvana, and was put in a position where I had to Ult out or get torn up. My team didn't like that I was Ulting away from her instead of Ulting into her. Mind you it's only me and Shyv around, I have no vision to see if she has allies, my allies can't make it there, and I certainly can't 1v1. I've seen Malphite highlight plays where players were also forced to use his Ult to escape. 
Am I  in the wrong here?


**edit** When I tried explaining I'd seen Diamond players doing the same thing I just got mocked "you aint diamond youre wood" ... ummm okay? 

match history: think I was playing against a diamond smurf because Shyv stopped buying items 9 minutes in

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3000021607/1964200629365408?tab=overview

Whilst it's a bit of an oversimplification, think of it this way...If you would use your ultimate to secure a kill, you'd get 300 gold. If you use your ultimate to avoid certain death, you'd deny the enemy 300 gold. Either way, it's the same value.

Just mute them. They're no higher than you (assuming you're playing ranked), so they really have no good reason to flame you. If they were diamond smurfs, maybe. But when everyone's playing in their own rank, there's no good reason to flame.

Yes, you are required to ult into enemies with Malphite. Also, you may only use Ekko's ult when your "ghost" is right in the middle of the enemy team. And when you play Vayne you are required to Tumble at the enemy team every 2 seconds (every 1 second while your ult is active).

Personally I find nothing wrong with that kind of stuff. I understand that an ultimate can be used in a better way, but sometimes you have to use it to escape, it's better not to die rather to give experience and gold. I do that a lot when I play Lulu, just she is so damn squishy, sometimes I have to save myself.
Malphite ult is better to use than Flash simply on the basis of the cooldown. Dont sweat your teammates.

Idk im Diamond and ive seen all manner of ults used as escapes. 

When you watch challengers they sometimes use the likes of {{champion:240}} to escape.

Flaming is always wrong.
If your question implied also a "did I make the right decision?" tho...using Malph ult to avoid death is ok, but getting yourself in a position where you needed to do it in the first place...not so much so.
Well if you absolutely had to ult away or die then its an ok choice, but really there shouldn't be anytime in that matchup where you're forced to do so.
Shyv is pretty much designed to melt champs like Malphite. Once she builds Bloodrazor I don't want to be toe-to-toe with her.
